mapper.select: select p.remaining_funds as remainingFunds,u.name as applicant,f.applied_funds as appliedFunds,f.reason as reason,f.project_id as projectId,f.applied_time as appliedTime from tb_funds_log f left join tb_project_info p on f.project_id = p.id left join tb_user_info u on f.applicant_id = u.id
